channel.title: Bike – Vamos a Bailar
channel.description: A traveling blog for discovering South America

item.title: Mountain biking down on the Chimborazo
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
During my stay in Riobamba, I took one day for visiting the Chimborazo. It is the highest volcano in Ecuador with 6300 meters high. There are 2 refuges at respectively 5000 and 5100 meters high. From the first refuge, a friend and I went down with mountain bike. The goal San Juan. A city located […]

The post Mountain biking down on the Chimborazo appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: Death Road on bike: From 4700 meters to 1600 meters
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
The Death Road is the previous main road between the Altiplano and the Amazonian jungle. Made of earth, narrow, wet, everything for creating a dangerous road. Many accidents occurred for the condition reasons or for the craziness of the Bolivian drivers. Now, a newly paved road replaces this old one. The top The initial part […]

The post Death Road on bike: From 4700 meters to 1600 meters appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: A bike tour in the wineries of Mendoza
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
My first wish when I arrived in Mendoza was to taste the Argentinian wine. When I heard I can book a bike and move to the different wineries by myself, I jumped on the occasion. Let’s taste some wines! Get Your Bike I took my bike at Mr. Hugo Bike rental located in the Maipu […]

The post A bike tour in the wineries of Mendoza appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: Discovering Mendoza during a hot summer
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
Welcome to Mendoza, a hot and dry city where the grape is the king. During my stay, I not only compared the Argentinian wine to the Chilean wine. I also discovered the most impressive mountain in South America, Aconcagua. Last but not least, Mendoza is a great place for Tango. About the city The weather […]

The post Discovering Mendoza during a hot summer appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.
